intro: If youâ€™ve ever wanted to get a laugh out of people, you can try to whip them with the end of a towel. If you roll up your towel before you whip them, it will make an even bigger impact. When snapping a towel on other people, it's important that you know they are a good sport and won't get angry with you. Once you find a suitable target and know the right technique, snapping a towel is easy.

steps.title: Grab both ends and wind up the towel for a quick whip.
steps.subtitle: If you don't have time to prepare a whip, you can create a quick one. Hold onto both ends of the towel and move your hands around in circles to rotate the towel in one direction. This should spin the towel on top of itself and create a whip.
sub-points: This is not as good as folding and rolling your towel.
